Summary: light moved fast, then slow, then sped up and disappeared as though leaving atmosphere. similar to what I and others saw 7/4/12.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas outside looking at the sky. It was clear. The light moved from south to north, speeding up, then slowing down, then sped up and disappeared as though leaving the atmosphere directly over head. NOT AT THE HORIZON LINE. There were no flashing lights as though it could have been an airplane or helicopter, and light was very bright, brighter than any star in the sky. Only thing brighter was the moon.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Wichita
There were no other sightings in Wichita on or around February 4th 2013
